snippet: The government group that operates Japan’s widely criticized research whaling suffered a nearly crippling financial blow last year when its annual hunt was disrupted by an environmental group.
abstract: Institute of Cetacean Research, government group that operates Japan’s widely criticized research whaling, suffered a $20.5 financial loss in 2011when its annual hunt in the Antarctic Ocean was disrupted by environmental group Sea Shepherd Conservation Society.
lead_paragraph: The government group that operates Japan’s widely criticized research whaling suffered a nearly crippling financial blow last year when its annual hunt was disrupted by an environmental group.

headline.main: Japan: Whaling Group Suffers Financial Loss
headline.print_headline: Japan: Whaling Group Suffers Financial Loss
